name: Jeff Wayne's The War of the Worlds
name_original: Jeff Wayne's The War of the Worlds
description:
Jeff Wayne's The War of the Worlds is a strategy game developed by Rage Software. It was originally released in 1998. GT Interactive Software published the game.
You can play Jeff Wayne's The War of the Worlds on PC and PlayStation.
Steven B. Sargent produced the game. Jeff Wayne scored the game.
